It's important to note who you are playing
as that determines which C# you are
Leon, Helena, Chris, Piers, Jake, Sherry, Ada, Hunk(?)
the Game uses that to determine who's who.

Example, Leon and Chris in medical factory and you're playing as Chris
Leon - C1
Helena - C2
Chris - C3 (you)
Piers - C4

Of course, for those who still want to use the codes separately
C1:
581F0000 067d84e8

C2:
581F0000 067d84e8
581F1000 00000028

C3:
581F0000 067d84e8
581F1000 00000028
581F1000 00000028

C4:

581F1000 00000028
